# timeZone

**Instance Property**

The time zone used to create and parse date representations. When unspecified, GMT is used.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeZone: TimeZone! { get set }
```

## Discussion

Resetting this property can incur a significant performance cost, as it may cause internal state to be regenerated.

## Configuring the Formatter

- **formatOptions**: Options for generating and parsing ISO 8601 date representations. See [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options] for possible values.
